attributes.action: Reduce the Speed from 60mph to 45 mph on country roads s being used  race tracks and rat runs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to ask the prime minister to reduce the speed limit on country roads from 60mph to 45 this is to give road users ie cyclists and horse-riders and anyone who uses a slow vehicle a chance instead of being harassed on main roads and also stop people using country roads as rat runs ie driving like rally drivers down country lanes
